We strive to improve your experience on Dailyhunt and continue to work towards making our app the best. This update contains several under the hood changes and bug fixes that improve the performance of our app. We have also added a new dark theme and improved our gallery experience.

Love using Dailyhunt? Do leave us a review on the store or write to YourFriends@dailyhunt.in with your feedback.

Dailyhunt now sports a new avatar: a completely revamped experience that serves you personalised news, content, photos and videos

- Tap on the '+' to add topics & locations of your interest as tabs on your home screen
- Stay up to date with the latest content in the new 'For You' tab, personalised just for you

Customize the 'For You' feed by following your favorite Topics & Newspapers
Hit the '+' button next to the topic or newspaper name

Discover Newspapers of your interest in the recommended section by swiping right from 'For You'

We have also made several improvements and enhancements across the Dailyhunt app. Do write to us with your feedback / suggestions to YourFriends@dailyhunt.in, or by visiting the Feedback page under the More tab
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Bug fixes and performance improvements

Do write to us with your feedback / suggestions to YourFriends@dailyhunt.in, or by visiting the Feedback page under 'More'.

Introducing Comments on Dailyhunt!
We heard you, and now, we would like to hear from you.
Express your views by commenting and conversing with fellow Dailyhunt users on topics and stories of your interest.

Discover trending topics by scrolling through the 'For You' feed.

See something in your feed that you don't like?
Tap on the 3-dots to give your feedback or hide the story or publisher.

Dailyhunt goes local with DailyTV!
Enjoy immersive videos from your favorite sources, and 300+ locations across India.
Watch General Elections 2019 videos & updates on politics, sports, business & entertainment

Create your own perspectives on key stories - #KhudKiSochBanao
With Dailyhunt's all new algorithm powered perspective panel, read how other sources have covered the same issue

A brand new UI!
A completely revamped, clean and balanced UI for you to enjoy

Create your own feed - just 'Follow'!
Control and personalize your feed by following sources, locations, and topics of your interest.

Love using Dailyhunt? Leave us a review on the app store or write to YourFriends@dailyhunt.in with your feedback.

Custom Feed
Create your own feed by selecting your favorite sources and topics.
Head to the "Follow" section to get started.

Daily Share
Discover trending and shareworthy memes, jokes, greetings and more in your language.
Look for the tab in the News section.

Improve your Dailyhunt feed by providing feedback on sources by tapping on the 3-dots icon on each card.

Love using Dailyhunt? Leave us a review on the app store or write to YourFriends@dailyhunt.in with your feedback.

New! Find share-worthy images, memes, jokes & greetings in your language in the Viral tab, refreshed daily.

Want videos to play only when you want them to? Change your video playback preferences from settings, or by tapping on the 3-dots on the video card.

We have also made several improvements and enhancements across the Dailyhunt app. Do write to us with your feedback / suggestions to YourFriends@dailyhunt.in, or by visiting the Feedback page under the More tab

Modify your feed
Choose to see more or see less of particular genres of content. You could even choose to block certain publishers from appearing in your feed

Search
Find your favorite topics, sources, newspapers, photos or videos easily by tapping on the search bar

Dailyhunt, India’s #1 News, Entertainment & Video app goes Social! And with an all new experience!

• Sign in, create your Profile & put up your own Posts
• Discover what’s trending through users’ Posts
• Repost content you've liked & share your opinions
• Tag people, create hashtags & start conversations
• Found something interesting? Share it on the Dailyhunt App!
• Find your contacts on Dailyhunt & discover their posts & comments
• Follow your contacts, creators & celebrities & start engaging with their posts

We love hearing from our users!
Drop us a line at YourFriends@dailyhunt.in and let us know how you like the latest version of the app.

• Follow your contacts, creators & celebrities & start engaging with their posts

We love hearing from our users!
Drop us a line at YourFriends@dailyhunt.in and let us know how you like the latest version of the app
